Living.description: Broadwalk Mall - a hybrid residence with all you could need during your stay including a pharmacy, supermarket, bookshop, restaurant, nightclub and many other stalls.

spots.name: Broadwalk Mall
spots.details: A hybrid residence with all amenities for your stay.

Nightlife.description: Woodvale Grove - enjoy the liveliest street in Nairobi Westlands Area with many nightlife options at fair prices.
Nightlife.pricing: 25 dollars per person for guided nightlife tour

spots.name: Woodvale Grove
spots.details: Lively street in Westlands with many nightlife options.

Restaurants.description: From known places like Hyatt to hidden gems like Gursha and unrated Nyama choma places, we guide you to sample the different dishes available in Nairobi.

spots.name: Hyatt Nairobi
spots.details: Luxury dining experience in the heart of Nairobi.

spots.name: Local Nyama Choma Spot
spots.details: Unrated but authentic Nyama Choma experience.

Walking Tours.description: Take a stroll from Westlands, to the Nairobi landmarks and art installations. There is nothing like a good strong stroll in the land of marathoners.
Walking Tours.pricing: 25 dollars per person for guided walking tour

spots.name: Nairobi National Museum
spots.details: Major museum showcasing Kenyan history and culture.

spots.name: National Broadcaster KBC
spots.details: Historic site, scene of the 1982 attempted coup.

Shopping.description: We guide you to shop from Nairobi local designers as well as known brands available in Nairobi. (Specific brands will be added as partnerships are established.)

Review Centre.description: Share your experiences or read reviews from other visitors. (Feature implementation to be discussed)
